page.title: 12FARMING
page.content: Mr English is an{agricultural merchant of East Rainton. An{agricultural {merchant}is a person who trades as a merchant and sells agricultural produce.He has 5 lorries which can carry 10_20 tons. The furthest the lorries travel is{600_650 miles}from Aberdeen to London. The lorries must be tested every 12 months. They use 6-7mpg of diesel and use 90 gallons per day. A new large lorry, costs Â£32000, a small one costs Â£24000. Mr English buys{wheat, barley, oats, {hay, straw, linseed, peas, beans, oil {seed rape}and fertiliser. Soon he will buy{lupins}which are a{high protein {crop.}Fertiliser sells the best. It can kill most weeds as well. Mr English employs 13 people including his family. His telephone bill is Â£1400 for one-quarter of a year.
